document: BUILDINGS AS SYSTEMS by Ary M. Pedju Ir. Ars., Institut Teknologi Bandung, Bandung, Indonesia, 1963 Submitted in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Master in Architecture at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology, June 1965. Submitted by Ary M. Pedju Certified by Eduardo F. Catalano Thesis Advisor Accepted by Lawrence B. Anderson Head, Department of Architecture
